text: Hagi tamagra Kalne nehaza kumate vuta na'a fore nehifi ome keteta ete anantetira Hamatiema nehaza rankumate vuteta, anantetira henkamu Filistia vahe rankumatega Gati uramita ome keho. Hagi tamagra zamagrira zamagate ore'nazanagi, zamagrama eri'naza hazenkea keho. Mopazmimo'a tamagri mopa agatereno rana osu'ne.
